name: The Trainee Ghost
description:
You have just become a ghost. These are your first steps as one. Enjoy the beginning of your journey! Crystals are good for you. Don't disturb other ghosts and be careful with the obstacles!

Action game made for GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022 (May 20th 2022 - May 30th 2022) using Unity3D/C#. 

Theme: Death is only the beginning! 

Controls: Click or spacebar to move up. 

Credits: Design, programming and art by shizuniik. 

Free Assets: 

  • Background texture by Kenney.
  • SFX by SubspaceAudio.
  • Music by Fupi, Aszura and Scribe.
